subject: Re: How to run my java program thru Junit TestCase
msgSnippet: ... into ... How to test my application which takes a single argument in main()? You can write tests for each method of each class of your application, also
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "adnan_atique" <adnan_atique@y...>
wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I would like to run my application which takes a single argument
into
> the main() through JUnit Testcase.
>
> Thanks

How to test my application which takes a single argument in main()?
You can write tests for each method of each class of your
application, also your can call main() method from Tests. Usually it
is hard to verify the outcome of main(), as it may call GUI, or other
external processes out of our control. But may be you would not need
to test main(), if you have tests for all other methods and classes.
